comment.author: 31580040@N04
comment._content: Queen Saovabha Bongsri, en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Saovabha wife of King Chulalongkorn (Rama V), mother of King Vajiravudh (Rama VI) and King Prajadhipok (Rama VII). Her son King Vajiravudh bestowed the title of Queen Mother Sri Bajrindra on her.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: This picture (including the cropping and outlining) was published in The Evening herald. (Klamath Falls, Oregon), February 25, 1915, Page 2 chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn99063812/1915-02-25/ed-...

comment._content: ทรงพระเจริญ ด้วยเกล้าด้วยกระหม่อมขอเดชะ

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks for finding her, Retired at last. We'll fill in her name in the record the next time we update. I love her knickers! I can't read the date on the "version" of the image that Bain used, but it appears to be very close to the date that the "original" image was used in the Klamath Falls newspaper which is very interesting.  Thanks for finding it swanq.
